value.name: Jackie Kirk becomes City of Lincoln’s 814th Mayor
value.description: Labour Councillor Jackie Kirk has been appointed as the City of Lincoln’s 814th Mayor. She was handed the mantle of the City of Lincoln Mayor from Councillor Sue Burke during a council meeting held at Lincoln Cathedral’s Chapterhouse on Tuesday morning,
